Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the expertise that went into its creation. Considering its unparalleled benefits and the time we've invested in it, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it for $10000. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
